data.Title: Google to Release Core Algorithm Update in Coming Weeks
data.Description: Google has announced that their next core update is expected to roll out in the coming weeks. This update is expected to have a significant impact on search rankings.

data.Title: Google Search Experiencing High Ranking Volatility
data.Description: Commentary on the volatility of Google Search rankings, noting that it is "still pretty heated."

data.Title: Google Search Console Notes Being Retired
data.Description: Google updates their documentation to alert users of their final chance to download their Notes on Search data

data.Title: Google Testing AI-Powered "Overviews" Feature in Search
data.Description: Google is testing AI Overviews on Workspace accounts (also in the UK)

data.Title: Google Merchant Center Next Rolling Out to All Merchants
data.Description: Google Merchant Center Next now supports supplemental feeds, providing advertisers with a more efficient method to update product data. This enhancement streamlines inventory management and improves the accuracy of advertising campaigns.

data.Title: Google Confirms Country Code Domains Receive Ranking Boost
data.Description: This article reports on Google's confirmation that country code domain names (ccTLDs) receive a ranking boost in search results, giving an advantage to local websites.

data.Title: Google's URL Shortener, goo.gl, to be Discontinued
data.Description: Google's URL shortening service, goo.gl, is being discontinued, rendering billions of redirects inoperable. Users relying on goo.gl are advised to switch to alternative URL shortening solutions.

data.Title: Google Local Pack to Feature "Search Products with Camera"
data.Description: Google's local pack now incorporates a "search products with camera" functionality, allowing users to conduct visual searches for products offered by nearby businesses. This integration of visual search enhances the local shopping experience.

data.Title: Google is Automatically Translating Pages in Search Results
data.Description: Google is automatically translating web pages in search results for some users, including the title link and snippet. When users click through to the site, the page is also translated. Google recently expanded the number of languages it supports for this feature.

data.Title: Chrome to Show Full-Page Warnings for "Risky" Downloads
data.Description: Chrome will soon display full-page warnings for downloads deemed "risky." The new warning allows users to restore aborted downloads but prompts them to explain why they want to proceed. Google aims to gather user feedback on download behaviors.

data.Title: Google's Gemini AI Assistant May Be Integrated into Future Smart Glasses
data.Description: Google has reportedly approached EssilorLuxottica, a leading eyewear company, about integrating its Gemini AI assistant into future smart glasses. This move could be a response to Meta's investment in EssilorLuxottica for its own AI-powered glasses.

data.Title: Google Patents System for Controlling Robots with "Scene Memory Data"
data.Description: Google has filed a patent for a system that uses "scene memory data" to control robotic agents. The technology leverages neural networks to enhance robots' decision-making abilities by processing historical data and real-time visual information.

data.Title: Study Finds Data Powering AI is Disappearing from the Web
data.Description: A study reveals that a significant portion of data used to train AI models is becoming inaccessible. The research analyzed 14,000 web domains and found that 5% of all data and 25% of high-quality data has been restricted, potentially impacting AI development.

data.Title: Ignoring Website Accessibility Can Hurt Search Ranking and Lead to Legal Issues
data.Description: A study highlights that a majority of websites fail to comply with Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG). Neglecting website accessibility can negatively impact search engine rankings and potentially result in legal consequences.

data.Title: Teads and Outbrain Rumored to Merge in Ad Tech Deal
data.Description: Rumors are circulating about a potential merger between ad tech companies Teads and Outbrain. The deal, if confirmed, would significantly reshape the advertising technology landscape.

data.Title: Agencies SEO Services Market Growth Analysis With Investment Opportunities For 2024-2033
data.Description: The Business Research Company’s Agencies SEO Services Global Market Report 2024 – Market Size, Trends, And Global Forecast 2024-2033

data.Title: Google Chrome Could Make Product Comparisons Easier with AI
data.Description: Glenn Gabe highlights a potential upcoming feature in Google Chrome that would use AI to simplify product comparisons for users.

data.Title: Netflix's Ad-Supported Tier Sees Significant Growth
data.Description: Glenn Gabe discusses Netflix's upcoming ad platform and the growth of their ad-supported tier.

data.Title: Faulty Windows Update Causes Widespread System Crashes
data.Description: Glenn Gabe shares a concerning report from CrowdStrike about a faulty Windows update causing widespread system crashes, impacting banks, airlines, and other organizations.

data.Title: How to Bulk Export Translated Results from Google Search Console
data.Description: Glenn Gabe shares his latest blog post about how to bulk export translated results from Google Search Console by country using the GSC API and Analytics Edge.

data.Title: Google's John Mueller Offers Advice on Evaluating SEO Team Performance
data.Description: This article summarizes Google's John Mueller's advice on how to assess the effectiveness of your SEO team, including setting clear expectations, tracking progress, and communicating effectively.

data.Title: Manchester City Uses Fortnite to Expand its Global Audience
data.Description: This article explores how Manchester City is leveraging the popular video game Fortnite to expand its global audience and engage with fans in new and innovative ways.

data.Title: eBay Adds More AI Advertising Tools for Sellers
data.Description: This article discusses eBay's introduction of new AI-powered advertising tools for sellers on its platform, allowing them to leverage marketplace trends and search terms for campaign creation.

data.Title: Some Ad Tech Vendors Pulling Back from Google's Privacy Sandbox
data.Description: This article highlights the uncertainty surrounding Google's Privacy Sandbox, leading some ad tech vendors to withdraw their support due to concerns about its future and potential impact on the industry.

data.Title: How Revolut's Creator Strategy is Benefitting from YouTube's Long-Form Swing
data.Description: This article examines how challenger bank Revolut is capitalizing on YouTube's shift towards long-form content by partnering with creators to reach consumers and build brand awareness.

data.Title: How Chipotle's Fighting-Game-Focused Esports Strategy is Paying Off
data.Description: This article analyzes the success of Chipotle's esports strategy, which focuses on the fighting game community, and how it has led to increased brand awareness and purchase intent among target demographics.

data.Title: Instagram Expands Notes Feature to Reels and Grid Posts
data.Description: Instagram expands Notes, its temporary away status-like feature, to let users leave Notes on Reels and grid posts; the temporary comments are semi-private. Users will now be able to leave Notes on Reels and grid posts, where…

data.Title: Google Clarifies H1-H6 Headings For SEO
data.Description: Google's Gary Illyes answered a question about heading elements (H1, H2, etc.) and the best way to use them for SEO

data.Title: Gaming Affiliate Reduces Revenue Forecast Due to Google Policy
data.Description: Gaming affiliate reduced financial revenue forecast due to Google's site reputation abuse policy

data.Title: 3 Ways to Add a Human Touch to AI-Generated Content
data.Description: Find out how to add a personal touch, maintain your brand voice and incorporate human expertise into AI-generated content.

data.Title: Tension Between News Publishers and AI Companies Expands to Japan
data.Description: The tension between news publishers and AI companies expands to Japan. Japan newspaper association calls on government for legal reform to curb AI search

data.Title: Apple News Deal with Taboola Raises Privacy Concerns
data.Description: The Apple News deal with Taboola is shocking and off-brand, calling into question Apple's commitment to good customer experience, including privacy

data.Title: Baidu vs. Google: Navigating the SEO Landscape in 2024
data.Description: Learn the similarities and differences between Baidu and Google SEO and how to boost your presence in the Chinese search landscape.

data.Title: SEO is Changing Faster Than Ever, Says Expert
data.Description: In the last 18 months, SEO has been changing faster than in the last 25 years of Google. And to survive SEO needs a new mindset approach – this could be a challenge for some traditional SEOs I spoke to @MordyOberstein about what SEOs need to know about brand marketing

data.Title: How Partnerships Between Athletes and Brands are Changing
data.Description: Relationships between brands and athletes are getting shorter, as the line between influencer and athlete blurs.

data.Title: Publishers Report Mixed Results for Programmatic Revenue
data.Description: Publishers check in on their programmatic businesses.

data.Title: Advertisers Hesitant to Embrace Ads on Meta's Threads
data.Description: Sure, there's interest, but it's tempered by the fact that advertisers still don't really know why they should be on the app in the first place.

data.Title: Amazon Prime Day Recap: Shoppers Prioritize Household Items
data.Description: Market research firm Numerator said the average order size on Prime Day so far is $59.78, according to data culled from nearly 7,500 Amazon orders by more than 4,000 households.

data.Title: Daum Falls Behind as Bing and Rivals Leverage AI
data.Description: Exclusive: Daum falls behind as Bing and rivals leverage AI for market gains

data.Title: What SEO Should Know About Brand Marketing
data.Description: Learn how building a strong brand online prepares SEO professionals for a future driven by brand-first strategies.

data.Title: OpenAI Launches GPT-4o Mini
data.Description: OpenAI launches GPT-4o mini, a smaller, cheaper offshoot of GPT-4o, replacing GPT-3.5 Turbo, with support for all multimodal inputs and outputs coming soon

data.Title: US Shoppers Spend $14.2 Billion During Amazon Prime Day
data.Description: Adobe: US shoppers spent $14.2B during Amazon's 48-hour Prime Day sale, up 11% YoY and in line with estimates; Numerator: the average household spent about $152

data.Title: Google Search App Testing Save Feature for AI Overviews
data.Description: Google Search App is adding a feature to save AI overviews in a private collection.

data.Title: Link-Busters Reports Over a Billion DMCA Takedown Requests to Google
data.Description: Link-Busters, an anti-piracy company, has become the first to report over a billion DMCA takedown requests to Google Search. Approximately 75% of the reported URLs were removed, while 21% were not in Google's index but were blacklisted.

data.Title: Google Testing New Link Treatments and AI Overviews in Search Labs
data.Description: Google is actively testing new link treatments and SAVE AI Overviews in their Search Labs. These tests indicate ongoing efforts to enhance search results and user experience.

data.Title: Academic Authors Outraged Over Sale of Research Access to Microsoft AI
data.Description: Taylor & Francis, a publishing company, has sold access to academic research to Microsoft AI for $10 million in the first year. This agreement has sparked outrage among academic authors who were not informed about the deal.
